mapper.select: with fn as (select id,name,pid,depth,type,url,seq,code from SYS_FUNC_NODE where id in (SELECT SFN.id FROM [PlayNowLog].[dbo].[SYS_USER] SU, [PlayNowLog].[dbo].[SYS_ROLE] SR, [PlayNowLog].[dbo].[SYS_ROLE_USER] SRU, [PlayNowLog].[dbo].[SYS_FUNC_NODE] SFN, [PlayNowLog].[dbo].[SYS_ROLE_FUNC] SRF WHERE SU.ID = SRU.USER_ID AND SR.ID = SRU.ROLE_ID AND SFN.ID = SRF.FUNC_NODE_ID AND SRF.ROLE_ID = SR.ID AND SU.ID = #{id}) union all select sfn.id,sfn.name,sfn.pid,sfn.depth,sfn.type,sfn.url,sfn.seq,sfn.code from fn, [PlayNowLog].[dbo].[SYS_FUNC_NODE] sfn where fn.pid = sfn.id) select distinct * from fn
select count(1) from sys_user where is_delete = 0

WITH query AS (SELECT inner_query.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ${orderBys}) as rn FROM (select ID as id, NAME as name, PASSWORD as password, STAFF_NAME as staffName, PHONE_NO as phoneNo, MAIL_ADDRESS as mailAddress, UPDATE_PWD_TIME as updatePwdTime, LOGIN_COUNT as loginCount from sys_user where is_delete = 0
) inner_query) SELECT id,name,password,staffName,phoneNo,mailAddress,updatePwdTime,loginCount FROM query WHERE rn >= #{start} AND rn <= #{end}
